title: The Lonely Lobster
description: The story of the Lonely Lobster is the heartwarming tale of an unlikely friendship between two a lobster and a crab. The two are thrust together during a storm and became the best of friends despite the fact that lobsters like to dine on crabs. This surprising bond between predator and prey will leave you wondering, "Why canâ€™t we all just get along?"
author: Beth Costanzo
